EmailTemplate.description: Template for rebate Accrual notification sent out.
EmailTemplate.name: Rebate Accrual approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Rebate Accrual approval request - {!jj_rb_Rebate_Accrual__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Rebate Accrual Id: {!jj_rb_Rebate_Accrual__c.Name} for {!jj_rb_Rebate_Accrual__c.jj_rb_Customer__c} is awaiting your approval.
Regards, Rebate Management Team
